content: i designed this baby blanket to show off a wide range of tonal yarns it s knit in 1 piece with 1 seam to sew at the end as it is a blanket gauge is not crucial at a dk weight the finished blanket is 34 square it would look lovely in an endless amount of colour combinations i used 8 colours for my version but i think that it would look great in only 2 colours maybe black and white
